channel.title: I'am not able to run workstation on Mac

item.title: I'am not able to run workstation on Mac
item.dc:creator: anomyt
item.description:
I downgraded VBox to 5.0.20, and WS did start. Both GW and WS are working fine now. Strange.

item.title: I'am not able to run workstation on Mac
item.dc:creator: anomyt
item.description:
Hi,
this looks not Mac related. I’ve just updated to VirtualBox 5.0.24 on Windows, I installed VBox extension pack as well. I could import and run GW successfully, but after importing WS, when I try to run it, I get exactly same as above error message and code.
(I’m trying to run 13.0.1.1)

Read full topic

VERR_PDM_DRIVER_NOT_FOUND

Good day,

Did you install the VirtualBox-modules?

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: I'am not able to run workstation on Mac
item.dc:creator: pleasehelpme
item.description:
The configured driver wasn’t found. Either the necessary driver modules wasn’t loaded, the name was misspelled, or it was a misconfiguration. (VERR_PDM_DRIVER_NOT_FOUND).

code:
NS_ERROR_FAILURE (0x80004005)
components:
ConsoleWrap
interface:
IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}

I have successfully run gateway but i couldn’t do same with workstation

Read full topic
